item.description:
This is a ride down to Horseneck Beach/Gooseberry Island in Westport, MA and Evelyn's Restaurant in Tiverton, RI. with possible stop at Battleship Cove, Fall River, MA

We will take the super-slab to Fall River/Westport head to the Horseneck Beach area then to Evelyn's for a bit to eat, afterwords we will head south on RT. 77 to Sakonnet Pt. From there we will start making our way back home, depending how things go we can go the Battleship Cove, Fall River, MA and then carve our way north.
This ride is approx. 150 miles, with some super-slab travel. The weather is always a factor and temps. tend to be cooler on the coast, so dress accordingly, and bring your camera.

Here is a link to Evelyn's Drive Inn.
http://www.evelynsdri...
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the parking lot near the Bank of America
item.name: South Coast of MA & RI
